function.name: washingTemperature_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the water temperature of a washing machine to a specific temperature.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to adjust the water temperature.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment for adjusting the water temperature.

washingTemperature.description: The specific temperature to which the water temperature should be set.
